### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
I presume this is needed when there is more than one chain client that has wallets. Maybe the doc string could be clarified to say "of the wallets of all chain clients" or similar.
> Any reason to have definition?\n\nNo, I think something must have prompted me to add the definition at some point, but I can't think of what that would have been. Removed definition now (thanks)
